targets.rawSql:
SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(windspeedapparent AS numeric) * 1.9438444924406 AS windSpeed
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT cast(anglespeedapparent AS numeric) AS windAngleTrue from api.metrics WHERE vessel_id = '${boat}' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.outside.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS outsideTemperature
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.water.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS waterTemperature
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.outside.pressure' AS numeric) * 0.00029530 AS outsidePressure
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.inside.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS insideTemperature
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.outside.humidity' AS numeric) * 100 AS insideHumidity
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.engine.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS insideTemperature
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT time AS "time", cast(windspeedapparent AS numeric) * 1.9438444924406 AS windSpeed
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.water.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS waterTemperature,
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.outside.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS outsideTemperature,
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.inside.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS insideTemperature,
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.inside.fridge.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS fridgeTemperature
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.outside.temperature' AS numeric) - 273.15 AS outsideTemperature
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.outside.pressure' AS numeric) * 0.00029530 AS outsideTemperature,
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.inside.pressure' AS numeric) * 0.00029530 AS insideTemperature,
  cast(metrics-> 'environment.inside.fridge.pressure' AS numeric) * 0.00029530 AS fridgeTemperature
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  anglespeedapparent
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

SET vessel.id = '${__user.login}';
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  windSpeedApparent
FROM api.metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND vessel_id = '${boat}'
ORDER BY 1

list.label: Boat
list.name: boat
